name: AI Girl
description:
A role-playing game driven by pure AI. Through constant communication with your girlfriend, you can determine whether you are Neptune or an honest man. Real-time voice dialogue, multiple voices can be replaced, and you can replace it with your own voice model.

bilibili:https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV13P411Z76X/

discord:https://discord.gg/nH4fsGbjD5
